籤詩版本二:
He pilikia ke alanui, ua holo na lio a me na kanaka, a pilikia na koa ke nalowale.
Kiʻekiʻe ke kahakai, poʻi ka makani a me ka nalu, nahā ka waʻa, napoʻo ka lā, make nā pua, hāʻule ka lani, hāʻule ka hau, Win: bear.棹: hoe.
詩意:
Ua like keia hexagram me ka waapa e wawahi ana i kahakai.
E makaala i na pilikia a pau.
解曰: Kula kahiko a me ke kula kahiko. Noho mālie a hala ʻole. ʻAʻole pono e ʻimi i ka ʻōlelo aʻo. Hele manuahi.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ua nalowale ke Aliʻi o Chu Yin Ling
I ka hoʻomaka ʻana o ka makahiki 202 BC, he 400,000 mau pūʻali Han mai nā ʻaoʻao ʻekolu i hoʻopuni i ka pūʻali koa Xiang Yu ma Gaixia, he pōkole ka meaʻai. e ka puali Han. ʻO kēia ʻano noʻonoʻo noʻonoʻo o ka "hoʻopuni ʻia ma nā ʻaoʻao a pau" ua lilo ka pūʻali koa o Xiang Yu i ka naʻau.
No laila, alakaʻi ʻo Xiang Yu ma mua o 800 mau koa lio elite a hoʻoholo e haʻalele, aʻo ka pūʻali Han i ukali pū me Guan Ying a me 5,000 mau koa lio. Ma hope o ka hele ʻana i ka muliwai ʻo Huai, ʻo ka poʻe kaua lio o Xiang Yu he haneli wale nō i koe.
Ua nalowale ʻo Xiang Yu iā Yinling a nīnau aku i kahi kanaka mahiʻai ma kapa alanui no ke alanui e hiki ai i ka muliwai, me ka manaʻo ʻole, ua hahai ʻo ia i ke kuhikuhi a ka ʻelemakule a hiki i kahi puʻu, he mea paʻakikī ke neʻe, ʻaneʻane loaʻa ʻo ia e Liu ʻO ka pūʻali koa Bang. Ua hōʻea ʻo Xiang Yu i Wujiang a ʻike ʻo ia ua pau ke kūlana, ʻike ʻo ia i nā lunakahiko o Jiangdong me ka hilahila ʻole, pepehi ʻo ia iā ia iho a make.
聖意: Ke hopohopo nei ka ʻohana a me ka hale i ko lākou mau pōʻino ponoʻī, ʻImi kālā a hoʻopau i ka ʻoihana, ʻaʻole mau ka male ʻana, ʻo Liujia ka pōʻino. Nalo, neʻe, nalo waiwai, maʻi, ʻaʻole maikaʻi ka hoʻouna ʻana i kahi lua mauna.
古人: Ua nalowale ka mōʻī ʻo Yin Ling o Chu
